snippet: A ceremony for Derek Jeter, the Yankees’ retiring captain, honored a remarkable career that will be remembered as a success even if his team misses the playoffs this season.
abstract: Tyler Kepner On Baseball column; New York Yankees honor retiring captain Derek Jeter in pregame ceremony at Yankee Stadium; NBA legend Michael Jordan makes surprise appearance.
lead_paragraph: A ceremony for Derek Jeter, the Yankees’ retiring captain, honored a remarkable career that will be remembered as a success even if his team misses the playoffs this season.

headline.seo: Yankees Honor Derek Jeter as an Icon of His Generation
headline.main: Celebrating Glory, With Little Hope to Add to It
headline.print_headline: Celebrating Glory, With Little Hope to Add to It
